participant_1.background:
I like to get Chick-fil-A on my way to work.
I am always looking for ways to help others, and my birthday was a time for reflection and hope.
i am a wife.
I don't know how my family would react, but I would hope that they would be accepting.
i have been to 7 countries in europe and 3 countries in asia.

participant_2.background:
I was a librarian, but I lost my job because I was always forgetting where I put things.
I spent my last birthday at the library with Nanette.
i have several children.
i live a lie.
I would not be able to teach if I were blind because I would not be able to see my students or the blackboard.

content.text: Happy birthday! Hope you have a wonderful day!
Thank you! I spent my last birthday at the library with Nanette.
That sounds like a fun time!
It was! I'm glad I got to spend it with a friend.
What are you doing for your birthday this year?
I'm not sure yet. Maybe I'll go out to dinner with my family.
That sounds like a great idea!
Thanks!
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, go to the movies, and spend time with my family.
Those all sound like fun things to do!
They are!
I like to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially like historical fiction and romance novels.
Those are both great genres!
I know!
What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon, and I also love the Bridgerton series by Julia Quinn.
I've heard good things about both of those series! I'll have to check them out.
You should! They're both really good.
Thanks for the recommendation
